roleset.name: not having a limit

example.name: arg1
example.text: Although the power of officials are unlimited in countries not governed by the rule of law , it is only limited to their own citizens who are as meek as lambs .
example.arg: in countries not governed by the rule of law

roleset.note: UNLIMITED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7, relation to 'limit.01'. (from unlimited.01-j)
